solution.text:
Height of tent,h\(=_{k}_\)m
Base radius of tent,r\(=_{l}_\)m
Width of canvas material,w\(=_{j}_\)m
Extra length of material required\(=50\)cm\(=0.5\)m
Slant height of tent,l\(=\sqrt{h^2+r^2}\)
\(\Rightarrow l=\sqrt{_{k}_^2+_{l}_^2}=_{{trunc(((k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)
Curved surface area of tent\(=\pi rl\)
\(=\pi \times _{l}_ \times _{{trunc(((k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)
\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_m^2\)
Now, curved surface area of the tent \(=\) Quantity of canvas required
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_=w \times\) length of material
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_=_{j}_ \times\) length of material
\(\Rightarrow\)Length of material\(=\frac{_{{trunc((pi_val*l*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_}{_{j}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow\)Length of material\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*(l/Decimal(j))*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)
Total length of material required(including material required for stitching)\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*(l/Decimal(j))*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_+0.5=_{{trunc((pi_val*(l/Decimal(j))*(k**2+l**2)**Decimal(0.5)+Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)m

content.text: What length of canvas \(_{j}_\)m wide will be required to make a conical tent of height \(_{k}_\)m and base radius \(_{l}_\)m. Assume that the extra length that will be required for stitching margins and wastage in cutting is \(50\)cm.
